page.title: 02New House Farm
page.content: In Vicarage Lane there is a farm house called New House Farm. We found out that New House Farm house is not connected to New House Farms land. Mr Kerr owns New House Farm and Wylding Tree Farm..He does not need 2 houses. At New House Farm they have about 3 working men. On the farm they keep calves. They have up to 300 to 400 calves. They keep them up to 4 to 7 weeks. They send them off after twelve weeks to be fattened on another farm. They also keep three geese as pets and they guard the land. They have three tractors and a special lorry to carry the calves and cows. It is two storeys. The calves go on the top floor. They climb a special ramp. They use the tractors to get the grass to make the hay to give out to the calves in the winter.
